name: Protect Your Heart
description:
Your Heart Is A Fragile Thing. 

Your Goal:

Protect It!

How To Play?

Use space or enter to make selections.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to control the shield. Use the shield to block out the negative emotions.

_____________________________________

Each Emotion Has It's Own Danger

   

> Sadness will move slowly and deal 1 damage

> Anger will move slightly faster and deal 1 damage

> Fear will move extremely fast and deal 1 damage

> Doubt will move extremely slow, but will instantly break your heart

_____________________________________
